title: Altar Frontal, 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element with needle lace, reticella style
description: Large altar frontal with insertion bands of punto in aria in a reticella style showing an allover pattern of curving lines. Matching border with very deep points.
